casebody.data:
Brenda MARTIN, Administratrix and Personal Representative of the Estate of Theresa Martin, deceased, Plaintiff
v.
Rajakumar THOTAKURA, Umalakshmi Thotakura, and Winston Psychiatric Associates, Inc., jointly and severally, Defendants No. COA18-1247 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 20, 2019

AFFIRMED.
